pt: Cada unidade pode atacar somente uma vez por turno
Unidades possuem fraquezas e vantagens - apenas tropas podem capturar construções mas elas não tem chance contra tanques e tanques não podem atacar helicópteros
Você pode recrutar soldados in HQ mas é mais barato fazê-los nos quartéis
A unit loses all its remaining AP for the turn when capturing a Tower
Todas as construções produtivas requerem um soldado para mantê-las - capturá-las irá lhe custar um soldado
HQ and captured Towers or Airports will produce cash in every turn
Dinheiro pode ser gasto para recrutar unidades e fazer movimentos
Use seu dinheiro wisely - um grande exército será mais lento e menos efetivo que um pequeno esquadrão
It’s never a good idea to send a unit onto the battlefield alone
Mixing unit types in squads gives you a strategic advantage
You cannot deploy a unit when the spawning point is blocked and neither can the enemy - block enemy factories with your units
Units can attack only adjacent tiles - so when your target is far away you should first move your unit closer
HQ is the most valuable building in game - if you capture the enemy HQ you will win the game
< NOTHING TO DISPLAY&#000a;< SELECT UNIT OR BUILDING
* FREE AS FREEDOM, NOT FREE AS IN FREE BEER

To start a new game, press the Create button on one of the free slots. If the button is disabled, it means that you need to download an online map first. Visit http://online.tof.p1x.in to find some! Once you have hosted a game, give the match code to your friend so they may join.

While in a match, there is no time limit for you or your opponent to take a turn. Remember, you don't have to wait for your turn idly - you are free to play campaign, skirmish, or load into a different multiplayer match! Quitting the game is also an option, but would you do that?
You are limited to only four match slots, so remember to clear the ones, that have ended.
you may have up to four simultaneous games
